sentence.Network_en: Sarah looked slender-waisted, fragile and very beautiful.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨拉纤纤细腰，弱不禁风，楚楚动人。

sentence.Network_en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
sentence.Network_cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

sentence.Network_en: My idea of physical perfection is to be very slender.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我看来，要拥有完美身材就要非常苗条。

list.abs: To have a slender waist and hoary hair ., 沉腰潘鬓.
西药 English, 翻译, 例句, 字典 Chinese... ... 没药 myrrh;myrrh 细腰 slender waist;mortise and tenon joint on a coffin.
he had been attracted by her slender waist , " It is a ridiculous attachment , " twittered the other Swallows .他迷上了她的纤腰，“那样的爱慕太荒唐了，”其他的燕于叽叽喳喳地说。

auth_sentence.content: The high-waisted skirt of her costume touches the ground.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The high-waisted skirt of her costume touches the ground.

auth_sentence.content: Mongols were narrow-waisted and small-footed, with big heads.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mongols were narrow-waisted and small-footed, with big heads.

auth_sentence.content: A tall, blonde woman, slender, and stately.
auth_sentence.res_content: A tall, blonde woman, slender, and stately.
